tool_description:
Access the latest trending hashtags and topics for all countries from Twitter (X).
For support & feature request: kerbalsc@gmail.com
name: Twitter Trends by Location
title: Twitter Trends by Location

api_list.name: Get trending hashtags / topics for location
api_list.description: Fetch the list of **trending hashtags** and **topics** for a specified **location**. This endpoint returns a maximum of **40** trending items. Note that certain countries may have zero items if there are no trending topics in that location.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-trends-by-location.p.rapidapi.com/location/f719fcd7bc333af4b3d78d0e65893e5e"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-trends-by-location.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-trends-by-location.p.rapidapi.com/location/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-trends-by-location.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get available locations
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all available locations. Currently supports countries, with upcoming city additions. Stay tuned for updates.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-trends-by-location.p.rapidapi.com/locations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-trends-by-location.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
